title: Over here: Irish music and dance in England
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Social life and customs

description: Uses archive film to explain why so many Irish-born people live in Britain and records examples of the Irish tradition at work there. Reveals the rich tradition of music, song and dance which the Irish have brought with them to Britain.
